00021 #ifndef _VIDEO_1394_H
00022 #define _VIDEO_1394_H
00023 
00024 #include "ieee1394-ioctl.h"
00025 
00026 #define VIDEO1394_DRIVER_NAME "video1394"
00027 
00028 #define VIDEO1394_MAX_SIZE 0x4000000
00029 
00030 enum {
00031      VIDEO1394_BUFFER_FREE = 0,
00032      VIDEO1394_BUFFER_QUEUED,
00033      VIDEO1394_BUFFER_READY
00034 };
00035 
00036 #define VIDEO1394_SYNC_FRAMES          0x00000001
00037 #define VIDEO1394_INCLUDE_ISO_HEADERS  0x00000002
00038 #define VIDEO1394_VARIABLE_PACKET_SIZE 0x00000004
00039 
00040 struct video1394_mmap {
00041      int channel;             /* -1 to find an open channel in LISTEN/TALK */
00042      unsigned int sync_tag;
00043      unsigned int nb_buffers;
00044      unsigned int buf_size;
00045      unsigned int packet_size; /* For VARIABLE_PACKET_SIZE:
00046                          Maximum packet size */
00047      unsigned int fps;
00048      unsigned int syt_offset;
00049      unsigned int flags;
00050 };
00051 
00052 /* For TALK_QUEUE_BUFFER with VIDEO1394_VARIABLE_PACKET_SIZE use */
00053 struct video1394_queue_variable {
00054      unsigned int channel;
00055      unsigned int buffer;
00056      unsigned int __user * packet_sizes; /* Buffer of size:
00057                            buf_size / packet_size  */
00058 };
00059 
00060 struct video1394_wait {
00061      unsigned int channel;
00062      unsigned int buffer;
00063      struct timeval filltime; /* time of buffer full */
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 #endif
